value:
Uther... I wish I could have been at
your side to aid you, Brother...

This here is the freezing lance Maltet.
Just like Armads, it's counted among
the legendary weapons of Elibe.$k$pThat said, wielding it is quite different
from wielding an axe...

Don't get too close. One wrong step
and this heavy armor could crush you
flat. Hahaha! I'm only joking, friend!$k$pDo be careful around me, though...

Daily training is essential if you want
to move around in heavy armor like
this. Care to join me?$k$pOnce you get used to being sore all
the time, it's actually quite fun!

Hey, what's with that strange look
you're giving me? Oh, this? It's just a
book.$k$pWhat?! Aw, come on. I read! A lord
has to have some refinement!

I'm Hector, Marquess of Ostia. And
I've brought you a message from
$Nf.

Heh, I couldn't lose right now if I
tried!

I think I'm finally getting the hang of
this lance.
Ugh... This armor sure is heavy...

Oho! Thanks, friend! I'll pay you back
like I always do—on the battlefield!

I'm Hector, Marquess of Ostia. I was
wondering why I was called here,
but...$k$pWell, if you have some foes that need
routing, I have just the lance for the
job.

Hey, let me ask you a question...
What qualities do you suppose are
most important for a ruler to have?$k$pI've been thinking about this since I
succeeded the throne. And aside
from bravery, I'm at a total loss...$k$pThe respect of the people, you say?
Hm... Without the backing of the
people, one isn't qualified to rule...$k$pYes, I think that makes good sense.$k$pHowever, respect is not something
you can see with your eyes.$k$pHuh? Seeing isn't always believing?
There you go again, doling out
wisdom faster than I can keep up!$k$pWell, if that's the expectation set for
me as a ruler, then I'll just have to
meet it.$k$pFor those who have put their faith in
me...and for my brother.
せいっ！
いくぜっ！
うああっ！
まだまだ…！
Prepare to die!
Clear a path!
Your luck's run out!
Pierce the sky, Maltet!
Uther... I...
うーむ
This here is heavy armor from House Ostia. And let me tell you, they don't call it "heavy" for nothing!
Who was that? This bulky armor makes it so hard to move. Normally I'm lighter on my feet, I swear!
Get this. "For generations, Corrupt neither the body nor the mind has been the dominant ideology of Ostia."
My brother Uther was the Marquess of Ostia. He was a great man... Someone you could truly respect.
My dream was to one day grow wiser so I could sit at my brother's side and aid him.
I never asked it of him, but... Even on the verge of death, he watched over me.
You're not dying while I'm around. Not a chance.
Right.
I'm up next!
One step at a time.
